Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: It was just what I was expecting. There were no issues with packaging or broken products. Everything listed was included. Everything was also brand new, still in its packaging.

Reviews.Title: good for the expert novice
Reviews.Author: simone
Reviews.Content: this was a gift to my husband...he's in love with it. made his Christmas perfect. all of the accessories made it even better...an excellent purchase!!

Reviews.Title: NOT Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Sam Spillman
Reviews.Content: I did alot of research, this was the Best deal for this camera. I am not disappointed, love my camera!! And the accessories that come with it are awesome also!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Andy L Anderson
Reviews.Content: This is a top notch camera with a high megapixel. I would recommend this camera to others who are shopping for a high quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable price for an excellent product
Reviews.Author: Luis Marenco
Reviews.Content: An awesome camera at an unbeatable price. The memory cars, the remote control and the case (if you like the one included) are thing that you must buy anyway thus you may be saving up to 100 dollars if instead you bye these items individually. Some may be just rubbish but who cares, it is a greats price. By the way D3200 beat camera for starters, 24 megapixels, live view, record HD VIDEO and come with a 18-55 mm lens which will be perfect for 90% of you family, social and personal photos

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Melony A. Roberts "book lover"
Reviews.Content: This camera rocks!  I haven't had the time to just sit and learn everything there is to know about it just yet, but it was easy to pick up and just start shooting pictures with!  Can't wait to see what all it can do!

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Stacy Lynn Milroy
Reviews.Content: As a new photographer I was very excited that this kit came with everything that I needed to get started.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Billy P. Beamgard
Reviews.Content: I have three grandchildren and I have been taking pictures of them with small cameras. They had at the best 13 megapixels and a combination of digital and manual zooms.The Nikon D3200 camera has 33 megapixels, automatic pictures, remote control shutter control, auto flash if needed and crystal clear pictures and many more functions for special photo shots.I LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!!!!!!!!!!BILL

Reviews.Title: Ease of pictures
Reviews.Author: Gordon Willard
Reviews.Content: According to the manufactures instruction book you turn the camera on and take pictures. On this camera you turn the camera on and a menu comes up  and you have to push buttons to make the menu go away and then you can take pictures. not very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Mike Swanigan
Reviews.Content: Excellent intro DSR camera...very impressed with features and quality of pictures.  The auto flash comes one inside when it probably doesn't need to but the one click button to turn it off is easy to use in the moment.

Reviews.Title: TAKES PICTURES
Reviews.Author: 3 NEWFIES
Reviews.Content: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE MY CAMERATHIS IS SO STUPID HOW MANY TIMES DO I HAVE TO WRITE YOU ARE LUCKY I
